title: Teaching Methodology Practical Competency Enhancement: Understanding and Applying the Effectiveness of Early Childhood Programming Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and general understanding of educational curricula
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core effects of early childhood programming education (improved programming knowledge, computational thinking, mathematical skills, and cognitive abilities)
Learners can compare/analyze the advantages of unplugged activities and robot-assisted teaching methods and apply them to real educational contexts
Through project-based assessment, learners can propose design and implementation plans for early childhood programming education

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
